amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to direct the GAO to submit a report on the response of law enforcement agencies to reports of missing or murdered Indians, including recommendations for legislative solutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Gallego.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
